import React, { useState } from "react"; import Grid from "@material-ui/core/Grid"; import ProductMakeStyle from "./ProductMakeStyle"; import clsx from "clsx"; import Card from "@material-ui/core/Card"; import CardMedia from "@material-ui/core/CardMedia"; import CardContent from "@material-ui/core/CardContent"; import CardActions from "@material-ui/core/CardActions"; import Collapse from "@material-ui/core/Collapse"; import Avatar from "@material-ui/core/Avatar"; import IconButton from "@material-ui/core/IconButton"; import Typography from "@material-ui/core/Typography"; import ShoppingCartIcon from "@material-ui/icons/ShoppingCart"; import FavoriteIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Favorite"; import ShareIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Share"; import Container from "@material-ui/core/Container"; import Rating from "@material-ui/lab/Rating"; import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button"; const Product = () => { const classes = ProductMakeStyle(); const [expanded, setExpanded] = React.useState(false); const handleExpandClick = () => { setExpanded(!expanded); }; return ( Products {/* */} Product one GHc: 70.00 This impressive paella is a perfect party dish and a fun meal to cook together with your guests... {" "}
